errors.loginFailedExtended: Error occurred during the login, please try again, error: {{error}}
errors.loginFailedTryAgainLater: Error occurred during the login, please try again later
errors.logoutFailed: Error occurred during the logout, please try again, couldn't find the cookie
errors.logoutFailedExtended: Error occurred during the logout, please try again, error: {{error}}
errors.redirectError: Failed to login with JWT (ignore if it's a CORS error caused by 302 and 303 redirects): {{error}}
errors.noAuth: Failed to authenticate properly with the server
errors.noAuthCookies: Authentication completed but session could not be established. Please try logging in again.
